thread.section_title: Toptal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Toptal | toptal.com
thread.title: Kristy

author: Kristy
title: Kristy
text: We were extremely satisfied with all elements of working with TopTal. The signup and recruitment processes were very efficient and conducted with the utmost professionalism. The Lead Engineer recruited for my startup was a fantastic resource for driving a major project we were rolling out. He not only did what was requested of him but went over and above in proactively making recommnedations based on his experience. I would highly recommend TopTal to any businesses, startups in particular.
